desc: We are your one-stop freshie shop. layout.text: Our fragrance oil are 100% concentrated. Phthalate-Free We carry over 300 Fragrance oil

Our fragrance oil can be used in a wide variety of products, Candle making, Soap making, aroma beads, smelly jellies, air fresheners. & so much more. If you are looking for fragrance oil and you do not see it, Send us a message we may be able to custom order it for you!
